sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO nboard(title, pass, name, content, rdate) VALUES(#title#, #pass#, #name#, #content#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() over ( ORDER BY unq DESC) AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT unq, title, name, content, hits, DATE_FORMAT(rdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS rdate FROM nboard
WHERE $searchGubun$ LIKE '%$searchText$%'
ORDER BY unq DESC) AS a ) AS b WHERE rn >= #startIndex# AND rn <= #endIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM nboard
WHERE $searchGubun$ LIKE '%$searchText$%'
SELECT unq, title, name, content, rdate FROM nboard WHERE unq = '$unq$'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE nboard SET hits = hits+1 WHERE unq = #unq#
UPDATE nboard SET title=#title#, name=#name#, content=#content# WHERE unq=#unq#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nboard WHERE unq=#unq# AND pass=#pass#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM nboard WHERE unq = #unq# AND pass = #pass#
